name: Super Salad Savant
description:
Live your lifelong dream of being a Salad Chef Today! In this game you play head to head with a friend to be the best salad chef.

Super Salad Savant is a Two Player Salad Chef Simulation Game. It was developed by Austen Kinney between the dates 4/26/2022 and 5/2/2022 for the purpose of showing the extent of their development capabilities. 

Original Soundtrack:
